short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Returns ability to see dislikes on YouTube

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See YouTube Dislikes 👎

✨ See YouTube video dislikes again! Restore the dislike counter and make informed decisions about the content you watch.
---
 🔍 Detailed Description
🎥 Return YouTube Dislike brings back the ability to view dislikes on YouTube videos, helping you decide what to watch smarter. After YouTube removed the public dislike count, this extension steps in to restore this valuable feedback.
---
 🌟 Key Features
- ✔️ View accurate dislike counts on all YouTube videos  
- ✔️ Works on regular videos and YouTube Shorts  
- ✔️ See a like/dislike ratio bar below videos  
- ✔️ Multiple display formats (compact, standard, etc.)  
- ✔️ Customizable color themes (Classic, Accessible, Neon)  
- ✔️ Privacy-focused with minimal permissions  
---
 🔧 How It Works
🗂️ The extension combines archived like/dislike data with live input from users to show accurate dislike counts. Numbers are continuously updated based on real user behavior.
---
 🎨 Customization Options
- 🛠️ Choose how numbers are displayed (compact or full)  
- 🎨 Enable/disable the ratio bar  
- 🌈 Select from different color themes  
- 📊 Customize tooltip percentage display  
- 📱 Configure mobile and desktop preferences  
---
 🔒 Privacy & Security
- 🔐 No personal data collection  
- 🛡️ Minimal permissions required  
- 📖 Open-source for transparency  
- 🔄 Regular updates & maintenance  
---
 🎯 Perfect For
- 📊 Content creators analyzing video performance  
- 👀 Viewers making informed watching decisions  
- ⭐ Users seeking authentic feedback about video quality  
- 💡 Anyone missing YouTube's original dislike feature  
---
🌍 Community-driven and regularly maintained to ensure the best experience. Join millions of users who’ve already restored this essential YouTube feature!

📢 Note: This extension is not affiliated with or endorsed by YouTube/Google.
---
 🏷️ Tags
`youtube` 🎥, `dislikes` 👎, `youtube dislikes` 📊, `dislike counter` 📉, `youtube features` 🚀, `video metrics` 📈, `content rating` ⭐
